name: Parkour Simulator 3D
description:
Parkour Simulator 3D: choose freedom, choose motion, choose thrill. Express yourself in body language. Perform amazing stunts, compete with rivals, participate in street parkour battles, train and develop your abilities.

STORY MODE: be part of the street life.
Make your own decisions and see your traceur's abilities influence and change the plot. Choose how the story will end.

DAMAGE MODE: pain parkour.
In other words, all you have to do is make your runner fall from roofs, bump into crates, hit trash bins and do everything to gain as many damage points as you can.

BATTLE MODE: compete and become #1 traceur.
Choose and customize your runner and be number 1 on the leaderboard.

Controls:
- sidestep to the left/right to avoid obstacles
- jump over/slide under obstacles that can't be avoided
- high jump to climb
- long jump to overcome a gap.
